title: Paperless Conference System (Web development Frontend)
description: This is an advanced meeting and collaboration platform tailored for professional environments. Designed to enhance productivity in enterprise scenarios, it combines real-time collaboration tools with seamless user management and interactive document handling. This is a ToB product, and the version shown includes only the public-facing features.

title: MIU Policy
description: This is a full-stack academic project designed to streamline the management and presentation of institutional policies. It features a secure authentication system, a rich text editing interface, and a structured policy catalog.
